title: Charlemagne and his empire
brief_description: Pictures Charlemagne’s conquests , his close ties with the Roman Church, his system of government, and his many contributions to life in the Middle Ages. Shows how Charlemagne hoped to keep civilization and culture alive on the European continent during the early years of the Middle Ages. No other credits available.
